author: __flcl
content:
In Genesis File Format EIP https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7949 
1. config timestamps are integers, but genesis timestamp is hexUint
2. imho, the entire format can work well without `hexUint` by using decimal numbers instead. gasLimit, nonce, balance would look better. `*difficulty` readability would not suffer a lot
cc <@827653956955406406>  <@508125616940515329>  <@412614104222531604>
